DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate that Abatacept combined with Methotrexate will demonstrate a dose response efficacy in Japanese subjects with active Rheumatoid Arthritis similar to the dose response efficacy previously observed in the International clinical trials.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Abatacept in Japanese Patients With Active Rheumatoid Arthritis While Receiving Methotrexate
DOC.criteria: patients with active Rheumatoid Arthritis while on methotrexate having 12 tender and 10 swollen joints at randomization no current infection or other evolutive or uncontrolled disease
